item.title: CVE-2024-37480|2024-08-02T03:57:39.531Z -- apollo13themes -- apollo13%20framework%20extensions
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Apollo13Themes Apollo13 Framework Extensions apollo13-framework-extensions allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Apollo13 Framework Extensions: from n/a through 1.9.3.
